statements: SELECT * FROM query_anomalies
SELECT query_text FROM query_anomalies
SELECT query_id, anomaly_detected FROM query_anomalies
SELECT * FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_id = 1
SELECT query_text FROM query_anomalies WHERE anomaly_detected = true
SELECT * FROM query_anomalies WHERE anomaly_detected = TRUE;
SELECT query_text FROM query_anomalies ORDER BY query_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_text LIKE '%error%' AND anomaly_detected = TRUE;
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT query_text FROM query_anomalies WHERE query_text ILIKE 'select%' ORDER BY query_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM anomalies_table WHERE severity = 1;
SELECT id, description FROM anomalies_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, severity FROM anomalies_table WHERE severity > 2;
SELECT * FROM investigation_table WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table WHERE severity >= 3;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM anomalies_table WHERE severity = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT a.description, i.query FROM anomalies_table a JOIN investigation_table i ON a.id = i.anomaly_id WHERE a.severity < 4;
SELECT * FROM anomalies_table WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND severity > 2 ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT MAX(severity) AS max_severity, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM anomalies_table;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE join_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM queries ORDER BY query_date DESC;
SELECT id, anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE detection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'software' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT id, query_text FROM queries WHERE query_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY query_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2020-01-01' AND join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, anomaly_description, detection_date FROM anomalies WHERE detection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY anomaly_description ASC;
SELECT u.username, q.query_text FROM users u JOIN queries q ON u.id = q.user_id WHERE q.query_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query_name, anomaly_threshold FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_threshold > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM query_execution ORDER BY execution_time DESC;
SELECT execution_id, result_description FROM anomaly_results WHERE anomaly_score >= 0.8;
SELECT query_id, count(*) FROM query_execution GROUP BY query_id HAVING count(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection;
SELECT query_description, anomaly_threshold FROM anomaly_detection WHERE id = 3;
SELECT query_name, execution_time FROM query_execution JOIN anomaly_detection ON query_execution.query_id = anomaly_detection.id;
SELECT result_description, anomaly_score FROM anomaly_results WHERE result_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM query_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies;
SELECT id, anomaly_type FROM anomalies WHERE data_source = 'Sensor A';
SELECT anomaly_description FROM anomalies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY data_source DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE data_source LIKE '%Sensor%';
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'unusual' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT anomaly_description, data_source FROM anomalies WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY data_source ASC;
SELECT * FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_type = 'critical' AND data_source = 'sensor1';
SELECT id, anomaly_type FROM anomalies WHERE data_source = 'sensor2' ORDER BY anomaly_type ASC, id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT(data_source) FROM anomalies WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY data_source DESC;
